name: qa-challenge-accenture
description: Technical Challenge Accenture - DemoQA Automation using Playwright and TypeScript

scripts.test:report: npx playwright test --project=chromium --workers=1 && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.test:history: npx playwright test --project=chromium --workers=1; if (Test-Path allure-report/history) { cp -r allure-report/history allure-results }; npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report; npx allure open allure-report

author: Pedro Amaral
